name: LD46 - Survive the Apocalypse
description:
Survive the Apocalypse

You must keep your squad alive!

After the event, zeds roam the streets, nowhere is safe. As the gunner for a fighter plane, you must do your best to command the squad on the ground and keep it alive. Give commands to your squad to loot buildings, transfer wares back to the chopper and extract when it gets too hairy.
